directions: In a large bowl, place crabmeat, artichoke hearts, black olives, green onions, tomato, cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, and cayenne pepper.  Mix well.
Using a serrated knife, cut the baguette into 4 pieces, then cut each piece in half lengthwise.  Spoon crab mixture onto baguette halves.
Broil in the oven, on the lowest rack, until cheese is melted and top is starting to brown.
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) can quartered artichoke hearts, drained
1 (4 ounce) can sliced black olives, drained
title: Hot and Spicy Baguette Sandwiches
